name: Gnome Tower
description:
A micro game in 560 characters for the Biannual Tweet Tweet Jam 5.

Get some Gnomes until you get to the top.

fillp(░)h,x,y,t,e,w=0,61,99,0,8,127::★::cls()rectfill(w,w-23,0,w,1)for i=h,0,-1do

f,g,j,s,u,v,r=t%2,t%2.2,y-i*9,(i+t)%h,cos(s),2*sin(s)r=x+u
?f>1and"★"or"웃",r,j+5+v,2
?"😐",r,j+g+v,4
?"♥",r,j+f+3+v,6
if(i==h)l=r
if(btn(⬅️))x-=.7
if(btn(➡️))x+=.7
end
if(t%15==0)o,p=rnd(w),0
if(t%5<1)e,q=rnd(w),-9
p,q,x,z=p+2,q+4,mid(-5,x,w),y-9*h-5+g
?"█",l,z,3
?"◆",l,z-3,3
if(p>z and pl-7and oif(q>z and ql-6and e?f>1and"✽"or"◆",e,q,f>1and 7or 8
?"you win",47,h*10-99
?"😐",o,p,4
pal({[0]=-15,-14,-13,-8,-2},1)flip()t+=1/8goto ★
